name: TV
description: The client, an unemployed single mother with a 8 yrs old daughter and with mental health conditions, will be relocating to a new flat. They require a TV as the current one is not functioning, but client is facing financial difficulties in replacing one. Thank you so much for your involvement in helping the client and her daughter transition to a fresh start. Please contact me @9724 4034 *Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor.

name: TV
description: A low-income family with 5 young children is in need of a new TV as their current one is no longer functional. The TV would greatly benefit their pregnant mother, providing entertainment and helping her manage the household while her husband is at work.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Yu Ki

name: Walking stick
description:
Senior has weak legs and needs a walking stick to ambulate herself at home but lacks the financial capacity to purchase one. 

You can contact me at 91271945.

name: Sofa
description: This is a family composed of two 70+ years old elderly clients. The husband is suffering from terminal cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. Since there is no other source of income in the household, they are currently in need of a sofa. The previously donated second-hand sofa is now damaged. They are hoping to find new donors who can contribute any form of sofa. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs. Please WhatsApp messages Hsin Yu at 8911 8058 or email to hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.

passiton.name: IKEA single recliner sofa
passiton.description: Well used recliner sofa single with minor defects. Self collect from Yishun. Please pay for delivery.
passiton.dimensions: W66 x L75 x H95 cm

name: Sofa bed
description: Client is a single mother with a 10-year-old son living in a rental flat. Due to low income, they cannot afford a new mattress even though the current one has started to smell. Therefore, they plead with donors to donate a double sofa bed (considering that the rental flat doesn't have separate rooms, space is limited). We would be extremely grateful if the donor can cover the delivery costs. Please contact Hsin Yu via WhatsApp messages at 8911 8058 or email: hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.

name: Sofa bed
description: Family has 3 school-going children and currently do not have a sustained income as it is a single-parent family. Family is need of a new sofa-bed to replace their current one that is torn and worn out

name: Sofa Bed
description:
Client is the sole breadwinner of the family with 2 young children and they live in a 2-room rental flat. Their current sofa has disintegrated badly and need a replacement. 

Please provide photo of the donated item to the caseworker. Please WhatsApp Kathryn at 8855 4012 or email to kathrynchia@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

name: Sofa Bed
description: The client is an elderly lady and retiree who relies on government payouts to get by and is facing significant financial difficulties. She is requesting a sofa bed for sleeping, as she currently sleeps on a chair. The sofa bed must look clean as she is particular about cleanliness.

name: Table
description: The household has 5 persons living in a 1 room rental flat.  The mother is unable to work due to health conditions.  She is seeking a rectangular table for use in the kitchen.

passiton.name: Working Table
passiton.description: Working table in good condition. Available mid to end of April.

passiton.name: Dining Table
passiton.description: Solid dark red dining table. Chairs NOT included. Class top can be removed (protects table surface so there are no scratches).
passiton.location: Amber Road, East Coast, Joo Chiat, Katong, Marine Parade, Meyer, Tanjong Rhu

passiton.name: Glass study table with stool
passiton.description: Only table with stool. Small cabinet below not included

passiton.name: Small ikea table
passiton.description: Small Ikea table. Do note the pink laminate have started to chip off from the table legs (see photo) but it is otherwise in a structurally good condition. If recipient is staying around commonwealth area I can deliver the table.  If not - appreciate if VWO can arrange for pick up from commonwealth

passiton.name: IKEA Alex Table
passiton.description: Used for about 6-7 years. There are some taping and defects on the table border both front and back as seen in the photo, but table is still usable. Has 2 drawers as well.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

passiton.name: Dark brown bedside table with 2 drawers
passiton.description: Dark brown bedside table with 2 drawers. Fully functioning. Available mid to end of April.

passiton.name: Ikea Smagora Changing Table with 1 Bookshelf
